original_title: Price of school bags and school shoes to reduce, says State Minister.
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya says that immediate steps will be taken to reduce the price of school bags and school shoes.

Addressing a discussion yesterday at the Ministry of Finance the minister says that he had requested the Department of Trade and Investment Policy to look into the matter and to provide a report within a week.
The minister said that if the price of school bags and shoes has not been reduced in the market, he will immediately notify the President and reduce the price.
The State Minister says that this decision was taken due to the difficulties faced by parents in purchasing school shoes and bags for their children with the commencement of the new school term.
